page.title: 10THE FINZEAN GAMEKEEPER.
page.content: The gamekeeper's functions are to protect game and all other forms of wildlife by controlling predators, especially{foxes and crows,}and organising an intensive winter feeding programme.He is responsible for woodland and farmland protection, controlling{red and roe deer and {rabbits.Heather burning}and{road } {maintenance}on the hills are his tasks too. He rears{pheasants}to augment the wild stock,feeding them daily until they are independant,vigilant at all times to protect the main coverts and release pens from stray dogs and human disturbance. On{shoots}he is in sole charge of guests,beaters,flankers and pickers- up,organising the disposal of the bag. His work preserves{Finzean's wildlife.
